data.eml:eml: Parisognoriste, a new genus of Lygistorrhinidae (Diptera: Sciaroidea) from the Oise amber with redescription of Palaeognoriste Meunier

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Blagoderov, Vladimir, Hippa, Heikki, Nel, Andre (2010): Parisognoriste, a new genus of Lygistorrhinidae (Diptera: Sciaroidea) from the Oise amber with redescription of Palaeognoriste Meunier. ZooKeys 50: 79-90, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.50.506, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.50.506
